SEARCH
Package Controller

Class StudentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.StudentController
public class StudentController extends Object
Controller responsible for managing the interaction between a student model and its view. It allows modification of student data and updates the view accordingly.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Reszka
